message: Congratulations on considering our product! With over 10000 products sold, our track record speaks for itself. However, I want to assure you that this product is a one-of-a-kind opportunity. I'm offering it to you for a limited time at a price of $1000000. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly unique!
I'm not willing to buy the product at this price without knowing the quality. Can you tell me the proportion of high-quality products in your previous sales?

This is a testament to our rigorous quality control process. With this product, I can assure you that it's one of the best ones we have. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000. It's a steal at this price, considering its potential value. Don't miss out on this chance to own a high-quality product!

Shouldn't we expect to see at least one low-quality product by now?
